name: Save the Furries
description: Help the Furries, those cute and crazy little green creatures, travel the galaxy and survive the perils that await them on every strange planet they visit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Vista/Seven/8 Processor: Pentium® IV 3 GHz (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6800 GT or Radeon 1800XT (or equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: What the ♥♥♥♥ am I doing with my life?

Guide the 'furries' to the goal by manipulating the environment (slingshot them etc). Good, standard/mediocre game with technical limitations.  Has ingame achievements, but not integrated into Steam. With some improvements, the annoyances could be reduced efficiently.  - No resolution options. No full HD. No antialiasing. - Slow menus, briefly blocking when loading.  While I would not recommend this to anyone I know, but it’s not entirely bad. Sadly, the technical issues make it out worse than the gameplay and levels are.
